1289180.name: Trail of Nanook
1289180.description:
The game is designed to play together preferably with loved ones. The Inuit culture is a very rich and nature based culture with rich story telling. They have a deep level of respect for nature because their survival depends on it. The game lets the players experience their ways and leave moral choices between them, hunting seals will feel as a necessity because the meat will feed you and your dogs and the bones can be used to manufacture tools. There is a crafting element in the game and both players are involved in the crafting.

Features:

  • Keep Each other Warm By Rubbing
  • Hunt for meat and catch fish to feed your selves and your Huskies
  • Build warm cosy Iglo's to recover your strengths
  • Cook your food to prolong its preservation
  • Gather resources to craft sleds and boats

Trail of Nanook is currently underdevelopment and aims to release on all major platforms.
1289180.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
